member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Get(System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of all aircrafts in the database. You can also filter the list.
member.param: Will filter on special livery when not null
Will filter on aircraft registration when not null
Will filter on aircrafttype when not null
Will filter on airline when not null
Will filter on airport when not null. (Currently broken)

Cannot find any aircraft that match filter parameters

member.param: The id of the aircraft that you want details of
member.response: Succesfully returns an aircraft
There was no aircraft found with the given id

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Post(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.AircraftRequestDto)
member.summary: Adds a new aircraft to the database
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "registration": "OO-ABC", "hasSpecialLivery": true, "firstSeen": "2020-07-13", "lastSeen": "2022-02-11", "airlineId": "92c70a1d-e55a-4e36-a504-1c477c3c4b1c", "aircraftTypeId": "f10b801f-ef2d-481b-9cfe-4bfe6182a832", "airportIds": [ "e2be3bd6-4c7b-41f4-a5c8-a1940310ea7d", "d8806f32-bf51-4b76-8c4f-37e0f532a6a7" ] } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on current id values
member.response: Created a new aircraft
The user added invalid information in the request
The user tried to couple an object that does not exist

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftsController.Put(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.AircraftRequestDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing aircraft
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "id": "036f4398-a726-4839-4931-08da0e7ef24d", "registration": "OO-ABC", "hasSpecialLivery": true, "firstSeen": "2020-07-13", "lastSeen": "2022-02-11", "airlineId": "92c70a1d-e55a-4e36-a504-1c477c3c4b1c", "aircraftTypeId": "f10b801f-ef2d-481b-9cfe-4bfe6182a832", "airportIds": [ "e2be3bd6-4c7b-41f4-a5c8-a1940310ea7d", "d8806f32-bf51-4b76-8c4f-37e0f532a6a7" ] } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on current id values
Updating the airports of an aircraft is currently not possible because of a bug somewhere in the code
member.response: Succesfully updated the aircraft
The user added invalid information in the request
There is no aircraft with the given id or the user tried to couple an object that does not exist
There is already an aircraft with the given registration

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftTypesController.Post(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.AircraftTypeRequestDto)
member.summary: Adds an aircrafttype to the database
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "brand": "Boeing", "type": "777-300ER", "icaoCode": "B77W", "firstFlight": "2003-02-24", "length": 73.86, "wingSpan": 64.80, "height": 18.5, "emptyWeight": 167829 } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on if this aircrafttype already exists
member.response: Created a new aircrafttype
The user added invalid information in the request

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AircraftTypesController.Put(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.AircraftTypeRequestDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing aircrafttype
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "id": "78b2795a-7ae5-437b-12e4-08da0e4b85b3" "brand": "Boeing", "type": "777-300ER", "icaoCode": "B77W", "firstFlight": "2003-02-24T00:00:00", "length": 73.86, "wingSpan": 64.8, "height": 18.5, "emptyWeight": 167829, } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on the current id values
member.response: Succesfully updated the aircrafttype
The date of the first flight is later than today
There is no aircrafttype with the given id
There is already an aircrafttype with the given icao code in the database

member.name: M:Imi.Project.Api.Controllers.AirlinesController.Post(Imi.Project.Api.Core.Dtos.AirlineRequestDto)
member.summary: Adds a new airline to the database
member.remarks:
Sample request:
{ "name": "Eurowings", "iataCode": "EW", "icaoCode": "EWG", "mainAirport": "Düsseldorf", "headQuarter": "Düsseldorf, Duitsland", "fleetSize": 94 } Caution: This is purely an example, it might not work depending on if this airline already exists.

Airline or id already exists

member.summary: Updates an existing airline

member.response: Succesfully updated the airline
There is no airline with the given id
There is already an airport with the given icao code in the database
